==Seting up an Android application with RDF OTG==
This new version of RDF OTG provide a native Android RDF store. All you need is just adding two jar file below:
- <a href='https://rdfonthego.googlecode.com/files/otg_rdf_core.jar'>RDF OTG native storage</a>Spaql query engine "Jena ARQ" ported for RDF OTG.
- <a href='https://rdfonthego.googlecode.com/files/otg_arq.jar'>Spaql query engine "Jena ARQ" ported for RDF OTG.</a>
